name: Cold Light
description:
Cold Light game was created for one of my classes in my college. it's purpose was introduction to game theory and game design, along with learning the basics of unity.

Code Provided:

Code physics and most scripts were created by Dylan Fries https://ca.linkedin.com/in/dylanfries He taught my class in 2019

Code for scene switching provided by Jesse Marofke https://twitter.com/jessemarofke
